title: nCr
text: Recollect the definition of choosing a combination of $$r$$ objects out of $$n$$ objects. This is denoted nCr $$=$$ n!/((n-r)!*r!)

title: Factorial
text: Recollect the definition of a factorial, $$n!$$ $$=$$ $$n \left(n-1\right) ...1$$, so we have $$n!$$ $$=$$ n*(n-1)!

title: Final answer
text: Using the formula for a combination and the properties of factorial what is the final answer? (Think about how we cancel one of the terms in the numerator and denominator)
